subdisciplines.name: Performance Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the practical aspects of staging Shakespeare's plays, including acting, directing, and criticism.

subdisciplines.name: Textual Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the various texts of Shakespeare's plays and their transmission, including issues of authorship, editing, and printing.

subdisciplines.name: Cultural Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of Shakespeare's works and their cultural contexts, including history, politics, and society.

subdisciplines.name: Gender Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of gender issues in Shakespeare's works, including the representation of women, masculinity, and sexuality.
